mapper.sql: id, accountCode, userCode, identityCode, loginNumber, password, status, userType, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_user_account ( accountCode, userCode, identityCode, loginNumber, password, status, userType, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{accountCode}, #{userCode}, #{identityCode}, #{loginNumber}, #{password}, #{status}, #{userType}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_user_account
accountCode = #{accountCode},
userCode = #{userCode},
identityCode = #{identityCode},
loginNumber = #{loginNumber},
password = #{password},
status = #{status},
userType = #{userType},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_user_account
accountCode = #{map.accountCode},
userCode = #{map.userCode},
identityCode = #{map.identityCode},
loginNumber = #{map.loginNumber},
password = #{map.password},
status = #{map.status},
userType = #{map.userType},
description = #{map.description},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_user_account ( accountCode, userCode, identityCode, loginNumber, password, status, userType, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.accountCode}, #{map.userCode}, #{map.identityCode}, #{map.loginNumber}, #{map.password}, #{map.status}, #{map.userType}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_user_account
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND accountCode like CONCAT('%', #{accountCode} , '%')
AND userCode like CONCAT('%', #{userCode} , '%')
AND identityCode like CONCAT('%', #{identityCode} , '%')
AND loginNumber like CONCAT('%', #{loginNumber} , '%')
AND password like CONCAT('%', #{password} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND userType like CONCAT('%', #{userType} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
